org.md2k.datakit.privacy

Class PrivacyManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.md2k.datakit.privacy.PrivacyManager

  • public class PrivacyManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides methods for insuring the user's privacy preferences are respected.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Clears listPrivacyListDsId and closes the RoutingManager and PrivacyManager.

        Returns whether the PrivacyManager is currently active.
        Returns:

        Returns this instance of the PrivacyManager.

        If an instance doesn't already exist, it creates one.

        Returns:

      • insert

        public Status insert(int ds_id,
                     DataType[] dataTypes)
        Attempts to insert the given data source into the database, if privacy preferences allow.
        Parameters:
        ds_id - Data source identifier.
        dataTypes - Array of dataTypes to insert.
        Returns:
        A status corresponding to the success or error of the insert action.

      • insertPrivacy

        Parameters:

                       DataTypeDoubleArray[] dataTypes)

        Parameters:
        ds_id - Data source identifier.
        dataTypes - Array of high frequency data.
        Returns:
